name: Ideainternet
description:
Having a strategy to attract customers to your website is important, but it is even more important that your website turns them into potential customers. Have you had that frustrating feeling when you enter a website and you do not find the information you are looking for? Most likely is the case of your website and you do not know.
The design and structure of a website is not simple vanity or taste, good design generates confidence and a good structure generates actions that become customers.
